TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
you wish to ide.

I wish for leonard nimoy to not be dead.

granted, except its only in our hearts, and through his work.

also you can contribute to any of his favorite charities or his foundation

https://www.looktothestars.org/celebrity/leonard-nimoy

I wish for there to be a fresh gallon of 1% milk in my fridge.

Granted. It's a mixture made of 1% milk and 99% concentrated nitric acid.

I wish for a fresh gallon of 100% milk in my fridge.

Granted. It's rat's milk.

I wish for a device that can see the future.

Granted. You get a box, silvery grey and unadorned. It might see into the future, but you will never be sure.

I wish for 30cm or more of snow to fall here in the next couple days.

granted. a giant snowball comes crashing through.

i wish to be in jurassic world.

Edited February 28, 2015 by SlenderFan
Oops.

Granted. You get eaten by an Allosaurus (cuz T-rex didn't exist yet).

I wish my car's engine worked like new.

Granted. It doesn't have any fuel in it, and you're on the highway.

I wish to get to part 2.

Granted. Directed by M. Night Shymalan.

I wish for a 6-pack of the ol' fizzy lifting drink. Haven't had on in ages.

Granted buts it's flat and stale and poisoned

i wish wish for the butterfly effect

Granted. you get a crate full of man-eating butterflys

I wish to go back in time and save the famous people who pasted away,such as robin williams columbia crew,etc

Granted. However, because their fate was thwarted, they become serial killers, and one of them ends up murdering your parents before you were born, causing you to cease to exist.

I wish my computer could play KSP at a steady 60 frames per second.

Granted. The game goes fine, but the computer heats up incredibly, so it is impractical to have it run for more than a minute or so.

I wish that my boots were dry (we did get the snow, maybe not quite 30cm over the last few days, but it is still falling, hence the wet boots).

Granted. You spontaneously combust, drying out your boots.

I wish I could draw.

Granted. You can draw, but very poorly.

I wish it snowed more.

Granted, the Ice Age just happened.

I wish I had a small rocket model.

Granted, but the set is missing the engine.

I wish I coukd be home right now.

Granted your familie is dead

i wish for a wish

Granted. you wish for a wish,but the wish rules deny it.

I wish i could walk the moon with a spacesuit.

Granted, the spacesuit has no helmet.

I wish for THIS wish to not be corrupted.

Granted. Your wish will not be touched... ever, and you will be alone with it all your life.

I wish my batteries would stop running out in 10 minutes or less.

Granted, they last for a month then suddenly blow up!

I wish I could be a pilot.

Granted, you join the military and are sent to bomb civilian targets. (Proud of yourself?)

I wish I could sleep more.

Granted. You can sleep, but it in a sleep study. The attendants wake you up and random hours of the night, and your sleep is ultimately less fruitful.

I wish for unlimited and magical power all to myself, that I can do anything I please (Muah ha ha!).

Granted. However, because you didn't wish for knowledge of how to actually use your power, the first time you attempt to do something you destroy yourself and everything in a five mile radius.

I wish I had a transporter.
